document_data.name: Noble Efreeti
document_data.mainbody: '''Noble efreet''' were the warlords of the [[efreet]] though they still reported to the [[Sultan of the Efreet|Sultan]] of the [[City of Brass]]. These creatures plotted against one another with cunning similar to creatures found on the lower planes. They would try to corrupt any [[sha'ir]] who summoned them.
document_data.Description: Noble efreet were even more massive than regular efreet. Their skin was colored like basalt and their eyes were flame. Males preferred clothing that showed off their massive muscled bodies.
document_data.Combat: Noble efreet were terrifying warriors, skilled in both magical and physical attacks. They led their troops from the front line where the fighting was thickest. Noble efreet had a wide array of magical powers that could be activated at any time.

Society.Relationships: Noble efreet viewed all living creatures as servants or enemies. Because of this, many other creatures native to the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]] would gladly assist anyone attempting to harm or embarrass a noble efreet.
